message.raw:
Working on lots of file operations -- can now read in existing globals and generate UI for them. Well, it could if the group importing worked. Which it will soon. Can also rename groups.

Also globals groups now have units stored as attributes to a subgroup. If a global has no units, then there is simply no attribute with its name.

message:
Working on lots of file operations -- can now read in existing globals and generate UI for them. Well, it could if the group importing worked. Which it will soon. Can also rename groups.

Also globals groups now have units stored as attributes to a subgroup. If a global has no units, then there is simply no attribute with its name.
